data: CARD AMB PACH Pulmonary Hypertension/Eisenmenger Standing Orders (Multiphase)
Laboratory
For patients with Eisenmenger's Syndrome add
Lytes Outpatient (Na, K)
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 6 month For 12 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Urea and Creatinine Panel
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 6 month For 12 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Uric Acid
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 6 month For 12 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Ferritin
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 6 month For 12 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Iron Transferrin Saturation Panel
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 6 month For 12 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
For women of child bearing age (age < 50 years) also include
HCG Quantitative Blood
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 1 month For 12 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Every three months
NT-pro BNP
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 3 month For 12 month, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

INR and PTT Panel
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit Every 1 month For 12 month, , CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
